name: Black King Bar
lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

descriptions.name: Avatar
descriptions.description: Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance.  Duration and cooldown decrease with each use. Duration: 10.0 / 9.0 / 8.0 / 7.0 / 6.0 / 5.0 Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

notes: Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.
Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
